name: Collecstar
description:
Collecstar is a 2D platform arcade game where you have to climb as high as possible by jumping on randomly spawned clouds while collecting as many stars as you can to increase your score even more. But watch out, as some stars may not be so friendly, and some clouds as well! Regardless, climb high and shoot for the stars to score big!

> Main features/characteristics:
- Double jump;
- Infinite, vertical-scrolling map;
- Increasing difficulty;
- Enemies stars and clouds that try to take your lives;
- Special stars to increase stats (gravity, jump speed);
- Hi-Score autosaving.
